mods.abstract: Typed transcripts of 4 complimentary messages regarding the actions of Holloman and the Police Department surrounding the Black Monday protests.

relatedItem.abstract: The Civil Rights Collection is a compilation of materials from numerous sources, including the following manuscript collections: Frank Holloman Collection, George W. Lee Collection (speeches and documents), A.W. Willis, Jr. Collection, Arthur L. Webb Collection, and the Catholic Human Relations Council Papers. Material will continue to be added to this collection.
